title: Price falls, expenditure constant, unit elastic D

content.question: Assume a consumer finds that his total expenditure on compact discs stays the same after the price of compact discs declines. Which of the following is true for this price change?

choices.label: Compact discs are inferior goods to this consumer.
The consumer’s demand for compact discs increased in response to the price change.
The consumer’s demand for compact discs is perfectly price elastic.
The consumer’s demand for compact discs is perfectly price inelastic.
The consumer’s demand for compact discs is unit price elastic.

content.answer: The consumer’s demand for compact discs is unit price elastic.
